steps.title: Change a friend or coworker's tech settings to another language.
steps.content: Change a friend or coworker's tech settings to another language. Get hold of their Facebook, phone or computer and change all the settings to Latin, or Spanish, or German, anything they don't speak.

steps.title: Change a few common words on Word or Outlook autocorrect.
steps.content: Change a few common words on Word or Outlook autocorrect. When your friend tries to type something, it automatically puts in the misspelled words. You can also do this in your friend's autocorrect on their phone so when they try to text they get really weird or hilarious words.

steps.title: Dip the ends of pens in clear nail polish.
steps.content: Dip the ends of pens in clear nail polish. Do this to your coworkers or your family members. The ink won't be able to get through and no one will be able to write anything.

steps.title: Put clear nail polish on some soap.
steps.content: Put clear nail polish on some soap. Leave it in the shower or by the sink so you can watch. It won't lather and your victim(s) won't be able to wash their hands or figure out why the soap won't work.

steps.title: Pretend raisin cookies are chocolate chip cookies.
steps.content: Pretend raisin cookies are chocolate chip cookies. Bring a large batch of raisin cookies into work and say that they are chocolate chip cookies. Watch as everyone gets really mad when they take a bite. To spice it up a little put some pepper in.

steps.title: Fill a mayo jar with vanilla pudding.
steps.content: Fill a mayo jar with vanilla pudding. Watch as someone makes a sandwich (or be really helpful and make them a sandwich). Or you could grab in down while you're with your friends and starting digging into the mayo.

steps.title: Switch the salt and the sugar.
steps.content: Switch the salt and the sugar. Put sugar in the salt shaker and put salt in the sugar bowl (or even in the sugar bag).

steps.title: Rickroll your friends.
steps.content: Rickroll your friends. Rickrolling is an internet prank/meme that involves Rick Astleyâ€™s Never Gonna Give You Up. To do this, follow these steps: Go to the Never Gonna Give You Up music video. Shorten the link with a website like bit.ly so the link cannot be recognized Send the shortened link to your friend. You could say something like "You won 100,000 dollars!" or something similar, but in place of the link, place your rickroll link.

steps.title: Put a piece of tape over a friend or coworker's computer mouse.
steps.content: Put a piece of tape over a friend or coworker's computer mouse. The mouse won't connect to the screen and it will drive them crazy trying to get their mouse to work. If you're feeling extra hilarious, put a funny picture on the underside of the mouse so they know who's responsible.

steps.title: Put yellow food coloring in the toilet tank.
steps.content: Put yellow food coloring in the toilet tank. The toilet tank has water that replenishes the water supply in the toilet bowl when you flush. Every time someone flushes the toilet it will make it look as if the toilet is broken.

steps.title: Make a bottomless box.
steps.content: Make a bottomless box. Cut through the bottoms of all the cereal boxes in your house and leave them upright in the cupboard for a hungry, unsuspecting victim to grab.

steps.title: Get someone stuck holding an egg through a door.
steps.content: Get someone stuck holding an egg through a door. When a friend or family member has their hands full, tell them you want to try an experiment. Get them to put their hand through a door and hold onto an egg. Then walk away, leaving them still standing, unable to leave without dropping the egg.

steps.title: Fill a deodorant container with cream cheese.
steps.content: Fill a deodorant container with cream cheese. Remove the deodorant stick from the container and replace it with a stick of cream cheese. You'll need to shape the cream cheese across the top of the deodorant container.

steps.title: Cover a door with saran wrap.
steps.content: Cover a door with saran wrap. You will only want to cover the upper part of the door, otherwise their feet will hit the wrap instead of their face. (You may be able to trip the victim if you put it below!) Also you need to pull the saran wrap taut to tape it, otherwise your victim will see it. Enlist a friend to help.

steps.title: Cover an actual egg with chocolate.
steps.content: Cover an actual egg with chocolate. Get a real egg and cover it with melted chocolate. Allow to dry. Cover it with brightly colored foil, like a chocolate egg. Give to someone you love.

steps.title: Switch the handle on the fridge door.
steps.content: Switch the handle on the fridge door. If you have a refrigerator that allows you to remove the handle, get a screwdriver and unscrew the handle. Switch it to the other side of the fridge, and screw it back in. People will try to open the fridge and get really frustrated when they can't.

steps.title: Fill a dozen cream donuts with mayo.
steps.content: Fill a dozen cream donuts with mayo. Get a dozen cream filled donuts, scrape out the cream, and refill it with mayo. Take to work and anonymously leave it in the break room.

steps.title: Change all the clocks in the house.
steps.content: Change all the clocks in the house. You'll need to have access to your victim's phone and computer, otherwise they will figure out pretty quickly what's going on. Change it to a couple hours ahead or behind.

steps.title: Saran wrap someone's car.
steps.content: Saran wrap someone's car. Take saran wrap and wrap it all the way around your victim's car so they can't get into with without cutting it. You'll need a lot of saran wrap to pull this off.
